name: Bullet Bender (itch) (X1 Games)
description:
Bullet Bender

Bullet bender is a game about a man who can bend a bullet's trajectory through telekinesis and rotation. Weave through swarms of attacks as you fire multiple distinct types of bullets at your foes to gain a higher score. 

Controls Key PressActionWASD/Arrow KeysMove
Left Mouse Button (When hovering on a bullet)Start rotating the bullet
Left Mouse Button/Space (When rotating a bullet)End rotating the bullet

I highly recommend that you play the game in full screen.

Credits

- Kenney (All art, textures, and SFX)

- Lewis Page (Developer and designer)

- skrjablin (Theme song)

Made for the Kenney Game Jam 2021
